items.sentence: There\'s really no reason for you to come to Boston.
There aren\'t any fish living in this river anymore.
This river isn\'t deep enough for this kind of boat.
People don\'t do things like that where I come from.
Tom has at least one conviction for drunken driving.
You don\'t have to talk to me if you don\'t want to.
It took Tom a lot longer to do that than it took me.
It took Tom an hour to load everything on the truck.
It took me a long time to do my homework last night.
It was difficult to persuade him to cancel the trip.
It was just three weeks ago that Tom came to see me.
I think we should be allowed to go anywhere we want.
I thought you were going to travel around Australia.
I didn\'t think that this book was very interesting.
I forgot I had a doctor\'s appointment this morning.
Tom asked Mary when she had sold her first painting.
Tom didn\'t commit the crimes he\'s been accused of.
Tom used to play the guitar better than he does now.
Tom must\'ve tried cleaning this without using soap.
I\'m pretty sure Tom doesn\'t know what he\'s doing.
